Comments.BaseUrl: Chrome River API base URL (usually doesn't change)
Comments.DaysBack: Number of days to look back for expenses
Comments.OutputFolder: Where to save downloaded PDF files (use double backslashes)
Comments.MaxRetryAttempts: Maximum retry attempts for corrupt PDFs (default: 3)
Comments.RetryStateFile: Tracks retry attempts across script executions
Comments.ValidationReportFile: Detailed validation report for all PDFs
Comments.PermanentFailuresFile: Log of PDFs that failed all retry attempts
Comments.Credentials: API credentials are stored separately in Credentials/ChromeRiver.cred
